plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be drama, as many of the movies listed fall into this category. The user's favourite setting is likely to be historical or fantasy, as many of the movies listed are set in different time periods or alternate realities. The user's favourite visual style is likely to be realistic and immersive, as many of the movies listed are based on real events or require a high level of special effects to bring their worlds to life. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be character-driven and thought-provoking, as many of the movies listed explore complex characters and tackle important social issues. The user's favourite runtime is likely to be around two hours, as many of the movies listed are feature-length and require a significant amount of time to fully explore their themes and characters. The user's favourite themes are likely to be drama, romance, and action, as many of the movies listed fall into these categories and require a balance of emotional depth, romantic tension, and thrilling action to be successful.
